text: Burgheim is a municipality in Neuburg-Schrobenhausen in Bavaria in Germany. It is a market town. ==Divisions== The municipality contains: *Burgheim *Biding *Dezenacker *Eschling *Illdorf *Kunding *Leidling *Längloh *Moos *Ortlfing *Straß *Wengen ==Note== There is a municipality in the same district named Bergheim. ==References== ==Other websites== *www.burgheim.de -- official website (in German) Category:Neuburg-Schrobenhausen
title: Burgheim
